product_overview: A modern, responsive single-page personal portfolio website designed to present a developerâ€™s professional profile, showcase skills and projects, and provide contact information with excellent UI/UX across devices and modes.
core_goals: Present a professional developer identity and create strong first impressions.
Showcase projects with clear structure, interactivity, and responsiveness.
Ensure accessibility, readability, and visual appeal in both Light and Dark modes.
Provide smooth, anchor-based navigation with a mobile-friendly menu.
Deliver a fully responsive experience optimized for mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Demonstrate attention to UI/UX details including interactions and animations.
Serve as a live, shareable portfolio for recruitment and client outreach.
key_features: Responsive top navigation bar with fixed/sticky positioning, anchor links to sections, and mobile menu toggle.
Hero section with name, professional title, introduction, social links, and call-to-action buttons.
About section presenting a professional summary and technologies used.
Skills display showcasing grouped technical skills with icons or badges.
Project gallery featuring clickable project cards with title, description, tech stack, live demo and GitHub links, and category filtering.
Contact section with clickable cards linking to email, LinkedIn, GitHub, and Telegram.
Theme toggle button enabling Light and Dark visual modes.
Interactive Moroccan-inspired background animation responding to mouse and scroll.
Static data configuration for site details and project information.
user_flow_summary: User lands on the site and views the hero section with introduction and call-to-action buttons.
User navigates via top navigation bar links to About, Skills, Projects, and Contact sections with smooth scrolling.
User toggles between Light and Dark mode using the theme toggle button.
User explores projects by filtering categories and clicking on project cards to access live demos or source code.
User interacts with contact cards to initiate email or open professional profiles in new tabs.
Mobile users access navigation via hamburger menu toggle and experience optimized layouts.
User experiences interactive background animation enhancing visual engagement without distraction.
validation_criteria: The website design is professionally consistent across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
All UI elements maintain excellent readability and adhere to WCAG contrast standards in both Light and Dark modes.
Navigation links scroll smoothly to the corresponding sections and the mobile menu toggles reliably.
Project filtering accurately updates the displayed project cards without errors.
All external links including live demos, GitHub, and contact methods open correctly in new tabs.
Theme toggle effectively switches visual modes preserving accessibility and style.
Interactive background responds fluidly to user input (mouse movement and scrolling).
Codebase follows clean, maintainable structure using React and Tailwind CSS conventions.
No broken or missing content across sections; all data displays correctly from static configuration.
